SqlString.String: select rt.sheetid, rt.refsheetid, rt.venderid, gd.goodscode, gd.goodsname, gd.goodsspec, gd.unitname, vd.vendercode, vd.vendername, rti.seqno, rti.price, rti.saletaxvalue, rti.salevalue, rti.cost, rti.costvalue, rti.notifyqty, rti.qty, rti.remark, rt.paytypecode, rt.flag, rt.editor, rt.editdate, rt.CheckDate, rti.warehouseid, wh.warehousename from ret rt inner join retitem rti on rt.sheetid=rti.sheetid inner join goods gd on rti.goodsid=gd.goodsid left join vender vd on vd.venderid=rt.venderid left join warehouse wh on wh.warehouseid=rti.warehouseid where

select rt.sheetid, rt.refsheetid, rt.flag, rt.paytypecode, pt.paytypename, rt.totalqty, rt.totalsalevalue, rt.Editor, rt.editdate, rt.CheckDate, rt.note, vd.vendername from ret rt inner join vender vd on vd.venderid=rt.venderid inner join paytype pt on pt.paytypecode=rt.paytypecode where

select rti.sheetid, gd.goodscode, gd.goodsname, gd.unitname, gd.goodsspec, rti.notifyqty, rti.qty, rti.price, rti.salevalue, rti.remark, rti.warehouseid, wh.warehousename from retitem rti inner join goods gd on rti.goodsid = gd.goodsid left join warehouse wh on wh.warehouseid=rti.warehouseid where rti.sheetid = @CODE
